replies.msg: Yes Ma’am

Golden Globe winner Bohemian Rhapsody has lowest Rotten Tomatoes score of 21st century.

Bohemian Rhapsody was one of the big winners of the Golden Globes but turns out it’s actually one of the only movies to win a major award with such a low Rotten Tomatoes score.

The film has a score on the site of 62% which makes it the 8th worst reviewed film to win a Golden Globe for best picture.The worst is the 1974 remake of A Star Is Born along with Richard Burton’s The Robe and Alec Guinness’ A Majority Of One.

If films before 2000 are ignored – older films tend not to have the same amount of reviews online – then Bohemian Rhapsody is the Golden Globe winner with the lowest tomatometer rating, including musical and comedy winners.

https://metro.co.uk/2019/01/07/golden-globe-winner-bohemian-rhapsody-lowest-rotten-tomatoes-score-21st-century-8316862
